reviewText: G,this movie be phat with a capital P yo.  My homeslice 666 be puttin' the smack down on Footie makin' him a straight up soldia.  Fats be in the house layin' down the cuts and keepin' Footie with a mad cash flow and always givin' props to his bro Quick.  Yo, if you be into guns and krazy coked-out gangstas wearin' their Starter jackets and FUBU, then this movie be fa you.
I LOVED THIS MOVIE...THE CHICKS WERE SHOOTING THE JOINT UP..THE MEN WERE GETTING BUSY TOO. IT`S JUST STRAIGHT UP ILL
